Where Can I Watch Croatian TV Online?

Most Croatian TV is only licensed to stream in Croatia. These platforms will determine your location by checking your IP address. If you don’t have a Croatian IP address, or your device provides conflicting location data, you’ll see an error message, like this one on Sportska Televizija:

“Nalazite se izvan granica RH ili imamo tehničkih poteškoća”

You can sometimes find Croatian content abroad on streaming platforms like Sling TV and KrowdTV. However, the choice is quite limited.

How to Watch Croatian TV on Any Device Safely With a VPN

You can safely watch Croatian channels such as Nova TV and HRT in HD from anywhere by downloading a VPN to your device or configuring it on your router. I recommend using ExpressVPN because it’s fast, has military-level security features, and is compatible with tons of devices.

This method works for these devices and others that natively support VPNs, like Fire Stick and Android TVs.

Sign up for a VPN. Go to the VPN’s official website, choose a plan, and follow the prompts to sign up.

Download the VPN. Once you’ve signed up, you can download the VPN app for your device either from the VPN’s website or your device's official app store.

Install the VPN. Follow your device’s prompts for installation. For Linux: if you can’t install the VPN directly with the GUI, you can manually do so using the command line (most VPNs provide instructions for specific devices on their website).

Connect to a server. After installing the app, connect to a server closest to your actual location for the best speeds.

Start watching Croatian TV. Open your favorite streaming platforms, like Doma TV, and start streaming safely in HD.

On Smart TVs and Roku

Many older smart TVs and streaming devices like Roku don't support native VPN apps. So you’ll need to install the VPN on your router. While the setup is a bit more technical, most VPNs have detailed guides on how to do it. All the VPNs on my list are compatible with popular routers and come with setup guides.

Check your router. Some routers don't work with VPNs, so first, find out your router's brand.

Sign up for a VPN. Pick one that's compatible with your router. For Asus, Linksys, or Netgear routers, ExpressVPN is a good choice. It has a custom router firmware and a router app that makes connecting easier.

Configure the VPN on your router. Find the setup guide specific to your VPN and router and follow it. After setup, all devices on that router will be protected by the VPN.

Connect to a server. Choose the one nearest to you for the best speeds possible.

Start watching Croatian TV. You're now set to stream Croatian content on any device, including your smart TV and Roku.

FAQs on Watching Croatian TV Online With a VPN

Is it possible to watch Croatian TV for free?

Yes, some Croatian TV channels, like RTL Televizija, Nova TV, and HRT 1, offer free online streams. However, the most reliable VPNs for streaming Croatian TV in HD from anywhere require a paid subscription. Fortunately, each of my recommended VPNs offers a reliable money-back guarantee, so you can get a refund if you’re not satisfied.

Some platforms, like Sling TV and KrowdTV, offer Croatian content outside the country. A VPN can help protect your connection and safely watch Croatian TV in HD from anywhere. Those that are listed in this article worked reliably during our testing.

Yes, because it’s legal to use VPNs in the USA. Some US streaming services, like Sling TV and KrowdTV, carry Croatian content. In addition, a tried-and-tested VPN makes it possible to access Croatian TV in HD from anywhere.

Yes, there are a few Croatian channels offered on US platforms. For instance, Sling TV and KlowdTV offer a selection of Croatian content, but the variety is limited. You won’t get as broad of a range of Croatian TV channels as you’ll get from within Croatia.

Is it possible to watch Croatian soccer live abroad?

You can watch Croatian sports from anywhere in HD using a VPN. You’ll need to use a premium VPN with secure Croatian servers, as this will let you stay up to date with the big game without risking your data.

Can I use a free VPN to watch Croatian TV online?

Yes, but I don’t recommend free VPNs, as they’re often unreliable and can even be dangerous. Free VPNs limit server networks to save money, meaning you might not be able to even find one with a Croatian server. A premium VPN with a trustworthy money-back guarantee is a more reliable option for getting fast speeds, unlimited data, and a selection of Croatian servers. That way, you can watch Croatian TV from anywhere safely in HD.

They can also compromise your privacy by logging and selling your data to advertisers or other third parties. There are also instances where free VPNs have been found to contain harmful malware, posing a risk to your device and data.
